history.message: IMPLEMENTATION REVIEW: We're adding PumpSwap DEX support to our MEV bot. Currently we have PumpFun bonding curve (program 6EF8..., pool at index 3) MISLABELED as 'pumpswap'. Our plan: (1) Rename existing 'pumpswap' → 'pumpfun_bonding_curve' everywhere, (2) Add NEW 'pumpswap_dex' field (program pAMMBay6oceH9fJKBRHGP5D4bD4sWpmSwMn52FMfXEA, pool at index 0), (3) Add new parser parse_pumpswap_dex_swap() similar to Raydium parsers. QUESTIONS: (1) Do you see any issues with this approach? (2) Should we keep BOTH PumpFun bonding curve AND PumpSwap DEX, or replace one with the other? (3) Any gotchas with PumpSwap DEX we should watch out for (fees, slippage, liquidity locks)? (4) Recommended discriminator validation approach - exact match on all 8 bytes or first few? We want this production-ready for live trading with real money.
